title: friend got permabanned
body: my friend got perma-banned for inappropriate username, shouldnt he have been given a temp username until he could make an appropriate username

replies.body:
Your friend had their name tempnamed and flagged for a free change. They chose to just rename to the same name they were flagged for.

So a permaban was placed on the account, seeing as they weren't willing to change their name the easy way, and once they contacted support their name was changed to one of their choice that support approved.
thanks for clearing this up, all i heard was that he was permabanned from 3 different sources, no one talked about the free name change part,

If riot can have players named "AUS Are All Pigs", then "deported arab" should be fine, i mean i played with a  "tentacle bukkake" tonight, "Fuk %%%%%s" im pretty sure ive seen too. All or none riot, consistency is the basis for trust, and right now, your customer base, and your player base dont trust you with being consistent. thats a pretty sad thing to say about what was once my favourite game.
If a name is offensive, report it. Word filters only take you so far, especially with names like those you mention. If an offensive name isn't seen, nothing can be done about it, so report them.

I havce repoirt the "Aus Are All PIgs" one multiple times and not gotten anyhting back saying that he was reprimanded, because that name is a combination of hate speech racism and offensive summoner.

The notifications of punishment are only sent to the very last person to report the offending player, and to the best of my knowledge are not sent for summoner names since mostly the punishment is not a ban but a temp name and a warning. So no, you wouldn't have gotten anything back, but that doesn't mean nothing has been or will be done.
he wasnt even a flamer, he was a good person and friend

Depends what the name was, and how many times he's changed it to something offensive. If he had a racist name, and got a temp name for it, but just chose another racist name and so on so forth then naturally he faced the same punishment that he would for repeated racist chat.
